reviews.text:
The ceviche was amazing!!!! Probably one of the best that I have had in nyc

The enchiladas de mole poblano were amazing!! The mole has such an amazing flavor.

I will certainly be back!

The cooking shows both knowledge and care. The staff treated us with care and focus. Group dining creates financial synergy here. Their culinary offerings are remarkably tasty. Eating here was exactly what I needed!

We've been going here since they first opened 20 years ago. The food is still good but they clearly care more about money than customer satisfaction. The quality of their burritos is a prime example. What was once the best in the entire neighborhood (cost, flavor, and portion) is now a last minute resort. 15 seems reasonable for a chicken burrito but they're half the size of nearby spots like Brothers, Chipotle, and Mr Burrito (all of whom stuff your tortilla to the max). Sometimes de Mole barely adds any meat at all like other reviews have mentioned. This mostly began during COVID but has continued over the years since then. My wife still thinks they have the best tacos in Sunnyside (no longer true IMO) so we end up there a few times a month but I'd definitely recommend folks with big appetites or in search of better values to go elsewhere. You'll get more bang for your buck when dining-in but that's true for most local restaurants.

It's a cozy place with some   different kinds of Mexiczn cuisine on offer, for example duck enchiladas. Nothing like you see on Mexico One Dish at a Time , ok, but not your average kitchen either. Mole poblano sauce was kind of thin, but still tasty. I'd recommend trying the other choices first. And it's the first restaurant I've seen in years with Negra Modelo on tap. Altogether  a good dining experience. There's a good reason they have been in the neighborhood for 18 years.
oldie and goodie ğŸ‘ŒğŸ½ğŸ˜‹âœ¨â€¦

We've been ordering from this restaurant for years, both the astoria and woodside locations, and have never had many issues. The prices have gone up but thats expected with the times, however after ordering our usual burritos ($15) for delivery yesterday, we were upset to find out that both of them, especially the carne asada burrito, was basically all rice and had maybe a few small pieces of meat inside. After calling to speak to them about it, they told us thats how it is always made and the portion given is the normal portion. This has not been an issue before and as people who order from them quite often, it seemed as though they didnt really care to make things right or listen to our complaint. Cost is cost but $15 for burritos that are 90% rice and no meat is unacceptable and we will no longer be ordering from there.
We didn't like it. Food was not so good. Nad service is too slow. Won't return
Very good choices and nice ambience

Love de Mole! I always order delivery and it is super fast, great variety of options (Iâ€™m vegetarian) and the staff for the times we have picked up is very kind. One of my favorite mexican food places and will always recommend!

I've been coming here for like 5 years, chilaquiles verdes con huevo y pollito. Today it surprised me with their delicious Salsa Macha that you can take it home with you. If it was already delicious enough, this added an extra cherry on top. Gracias por siempre servir comida muy rica.

With the sauce in the name, you need to deliver on flavor...
They delivered!

Unexpected bonus, the food comes out quick!

Vinimos a cenar despuÃ©s de una presentaciÃ³n de tango en el Teatro ThalÃ­a.
Pedimos la TampiqueÃ±a, Tacos con Carne Asada y otros con Pollo Asado, un huevo frito con arroz, guacamole, un pitcher de sangrÃ­a, helado de vainilla y churros con chocolate.
Todo delicioso. Volveremos. Gracias.

I go to Demole a few times out of the year but havenâ€™t been in a while and today we decided to have lunch there with my mom and sister. The food was so delicious. It usually always is but this time was the best I ever had. The nachos amazing, the ceviche, to die for the shrimp enchiladas, life changing!! It was so good Iâ€™m still thinking about it. Of courses I finished it off with some coconut flan ugh amazing! Also, Ruth our server is one of the best. She is an excellent server and she took great care of us. Thank you!

Excellent food and excellent staff.

I made a mistake and ordered pick up at the wrong location, I counted my loss and went to make a new order when the boss overheard and told me not to worry about it and they would make me the food where I was.

On top of the very kind gesture, I got the pollo mole and it was delicious. Will be coming back for sure

Came for Motherâ€™s Day with my family and our main dishes and desserts were amazing. Recommend the frozen white drink. Honestly has the best mole in an nyc restaurant. Coming back for Fatherâ€™s Day!
de Mole?? More like de licious!! The tortas are awesome and the veggie burrito is world class.
ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹â€¦
TamiqueÃ±as is so delicious and filling! Worth the price. Mole sauce is wonderful - name makes sense!

Wanted to like this place. LA native that wanted good Mexican food. Ordered pick up. Person on the phone was short and rude. I asked what the most popular dish was, She seemed bothered to be on the phone. $43.46 fro 1 person dinner.. Terrible. Churros 3/4 were warm 1/4 was rock hard. Food was pick up 5 mins early from their pick up time. Everything was COLD. Chips were crumbs. Not one full sized chip.

Uber driver I have no bags for my bag, I have a bag in fact, but I did not use it because it was a short distance, you do everything perfectly what you do when you give the negative score why you do not even want to do this job
Truly so good! Everything from the drinks, desserts and the food!
Been eating here for ages. Like going home to momâ€™s for a meal. â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
We love this place! And more importantly, so do our kids. Consistently delicious.

at el Mole. The food was absolutely delicious, and the service was top-notch. Our waiter, was very attentive and made excellent recommendations. The ambiance was perfect for a relaxing brunch with family and Friends.
The food was amazing along with the service. I would recommendğŸ‘ğŸ½

The food was good but I ordered 2 orders of taquitos and it seemed like they just gave one order and broke it in half (in the photo it looks like 6 but itâ€™s really 3 broken into 2 pieces).

Also to add chicken to the taquitos cost more than the taquitos themselves. And there was barely any chicken.

For the entree I got mole poblano. And it was very good . No complaints . Lots of flavor and very filling .
Service with care and attentiveness. Food was clean not heavy.
De Mole is absolutely incredible. The staff is so wonderful & friendly & the food is incredible.
Good service good food

I never thought I would give Mole less than five stars. They changed their burrito recipe and I will never order a burrito again from there. It was the best burrito I had ever had. Did they change it?

Hidden gem serving delicious Mexican food.
Pollo de Mole is scrumptious.  Have been dining in and getting take out for 7+years, consistently excellent.  The staff are friendly and accommodating.
Their food is consistently so good!  The restaurant is cozy and casual.  Our waitress checked in on us several times.    This is also one of our favorite take out spots as well.

Solid four. Food tastes great and minimal brunch menu is good thing.

It took them 45mins however to get us the food. Also, coffee is not refill free. Kind of frustrating as the mug they give it to you in, cools it very quickly so if you want another, pay up. The menu they also give you is confusing. Please stick to what you can order and the correct prices of that time.

Finally, serving on a wooden board is great for style but not practical when serving poached eggs, that will drop off the side. Some things to think about, otherwise a solid place.

Ordered chicken burrito delivery, delivey was proper, fast, honestly burrito was okay as far fresh, properly cooked but 80% of burrito was rice .. chicken was in traces..  idk why people try to cheap out on ingredients , so unnecessary,  like we live in north korea..and have shortages of meat,  i guess i have to spend my money elsewhere from now on

I ordered their Huevos a la Mexicana through Uber eats which were advertised to have beans and rice as part of the main platter and to be the same portion as the eggs. What I got was a very small portion of the rice and beans that would be considered a side dish. The eggs weren't spicy at all despite having jalapeÃ±os and were flavorless and this is coming from a Mexican.

I typically don't write reviews but I was left very disappointed with their food. I paid $24 dollars, not worth it at all
Great dinner today, food tasted good. Great portions and taste. Absolutely have to try the Hot Chocolate, Horchata and their special Chili en Nogada!
Nice place, good food and friends
Love this place so much! My favorite neighborhood restaurant
Food was good
Amazing authentic food and great service. Must visit if you are in the area.
Okay, food is alright. We are takebout customers
The burrito de mole recipe changed. This was my go to dish for 15+ years. Thereâ€™s little to no mole in it at all. Very disappointed, sadly wonâ€™t order again.
My favorite Mexican place! Great food, great service, great people. Highly recommended!!!
This place is awesome; amazing food, great prices and service, and friendly staff.
My Go To Place For a long time now! Delicious food, solid service, great prices! If your lucky you can get to try the infamous chocolate tres leches!

The vegan mushroom mole changed my life! Good service, good food, though portions are a little small for the price they have more outdoor dining than indoor dining. The tres leches was good but tasted a little bit like alcohol, not a totally traditional version. Can't wait to go back to try more dishes!

After strolling around with my wife, we decided to try out  Mole's food.
The place was not crowded and the decor was really nice which made it cozy and comfortable.
The waiter was really helpful and gave out recommendations once we explained to him it was our first time there.
I decided to try steak, and my wife tacos al pastor. The food was good but there is always room for improvement. (Better Tortillas, please)
Hopefully, one day, we can go back to try some other dish

Super delicious food here. We downed the nachos really quickly. Taco al pastor was sooooo good but the serving was kinda small so I had to savor it. Steak was also amazing. I think my only qualm with this place is the price, itâ€™s a bit expensive for what you get. The small plate of nachos was $11, and two tacos cost $12. The appetizer, one entree, and one drink came out to ~$40/person. Other than that, the service was good.

This is a nice spot, the food was tasty. I ordered guac and chips, there could have been more chips for the amount of guac they gave, had to double dip to eat it all. Also ordered the mole enchiladas, which were tasty as well. The sauce had a mild heat, which is welcoming.
Pastor tacos were very good. Not as greasy as I'm use to at home but still very good. The salsa was good but I just needed a little more heat. It's just what I'm use to being from South TX.ğŸ˜â€¦

Came here for the first time with a group of friends after an assembly because of the good reviews.
One of the best Mexican food I've enjoyed in a while.
I was so confused as to what I wanted to get and yet their attitude was great! Service is excellent! ğŸ‘Œ
For anyone coming for the first time
I would recommend: Fajitas Tex-Mex Style..Steak, Chicken & Shrimp combo...
Comes with Rice & Beans, Pico de gallo, well seasoned vegetables, guacamole and sour cream..

They also serve craft ğŸº beer.. You could even ask for a taste of one or two if you're not sure between which to decide!
They're white sangria ğŸ¹ğŸ·ğŸ¸was great too!

Iâ€™ve been eating here for years. Their vegan options are great...The seitan burrito is highly recommended...the chips with guacamole are tasty too.
Lately Iâ€™ve been getting rice and beans with a side order of freshâ€¦

This restaurant has a family friendly atmosphere, yet at the same time romantic which I found very interesting.. The food was good and the staff although took a while to serve us, we're plesan and professional. Overall my experience here was good and I will go back.
Best authentic Mexican restaurant Iâ€™ve eaten at where the food is amazing and well prepared. Every bite was exquisite

This place was amazing! We had the chicken, steak and shrimp fajitas with â€œde moleâ€ nachos and a chicken tamale. It was all phenomenal!! Only have a photo of desert (coco flan) because everything else was in our bellies by the time I even thought to take a photo.

Kinda disappointed with my recent visit to De mole.
Iâ€™ve been here many times before the pandemic and this was our first time back.

Seems like the menu has been changed and made a lot smaller. Very disappointed they took the elote (corn) from the menu.

The Ceviche was not good. It lacked the Citrus it needed. It was basically a chopped salad with a few rubber like fish pieces in it. It was not fresh and felt like it was defrosted.

Additionally everything else we ordered lacked flavor. Very different from before. I hope this place improves the quality of their food. We used to love going here and was a staple for us for dinner.

Service was very good. The atmosphere is very intimate. Perfect spot for a date but parking in this area is hard to find but not impossible!

Great sit down Mexican restaurant. I dine here all the time with my boyfriend on little dates. This restaurant has two dining areas (one is a little larger to accommodate ample guests during busy shifts). Quality food, reasonably priced.â€¦

I have been here several times now (give or take 7-8 times) and they have not disappointed once. I cannot tell you the countless occasions we have been here. On a date, for birthdays, and just lunch. The owner who is also the head chef, is a gentleman who really takes pride in his craft. I totally recommend this place to anyone who wants real authentic Mexican food to the core. Great job de Mole, you've been and will always be a favorite of mine.
UPDATE (pictures added): I came here once again 6/22/18 for my little ones graduation. In the photos I had an 8oz Sirloin Steak served in Chipotle sauce with rice and beans along with red sangria. As for desert, I had a tres leche cake. They did not disappoint. Order your steak right and you will be in heaven. Always keep an ear out for the specials when you visit because they are super tasty.

I haven't been back in years and I used to come here alot when I lived in Sunnyside. It was great back then and still amazing after all these years! Flavorful, great service and clean atmosphere. Glad I came back !

A neighborhood gem! I came here with my girlfriend for breakfast and we were blown away by the quality of the food and the service! Our waiter was considerate, kind, and recommended the Mollete for my girlfriend! Everything was delicious and we loved the fresh limeade and coffee. Will be coming again!
The atmosphere was really nice! The nachos were greatt! That chocolate tres leches cake was to die for and our server was such a sweet person! Her personality was so pleasant.
Excellent Mexican food! Love the salsa, sangria and everything I order there!
very cute little restaurant, the food was good and fresh and our server was very friendly.
Super cute place, romantic and very comfortable food was amazing and reasonably priced. Went here for an anniversary dinner but go on little date nights as well. ğŸ’•â€¦

Ottimo messicano, porzione abbondante ad un prezzo piÃ¹ che corretto.
Staff cordiale e professionale, da provare
Really love this place as it tastes so authentic and it's such a cozy spot. Feels like eating with family. The tinga and huevos rancheros are our go-to's.
One of my favorite places in the neighborhood.  Great Mexican food, nice staff.  Great for brunch or dinner.

Iâ€™ve never written a review for any restaurant before. From someone that has traveled the globe and lived in different countries this is by far the best brunch spot youâ€™ll ever find. Quality!!! The service is phenomenal, shout out to Alex and Jesus! Ask for them at the door! They will take great care of you. Definitely coming back again and again and again!
Buen lugar, la comida es mexicana super buena claro.

Their signature dish Mole was watered down and flavorless. The service was the worst part of this experience. Waitress gave us an attitude for asking questions. We ordered enchiladas de Mole from their brunch menu listed at $14 - we were charged their dinner menu price of $22 for substituting egg with spinach. We were never shown the dinner menu nor informed there was a price change. Waitress gave us an attitude for asking for price clarification before being charged.

Came here with my husband based on the reviews we were excited to try this place! However, the overall service wasnâ€™t great, took a while just to get some water for the table and the restaurant wasnâ€™t crowded at all. We ordered the seafood ceviche to start and it was overpowered by mostly red onions. I know ceviche has onions in it but the amount they put was a bit ridiculous.  My husband ordered the steak burrito and I ordered the Al pastor tacos. The tacos and burrito were mediocre, Iâ€™ve definitely had better. The taco was very greasy as well. An hour after we got home I was feeling really sick and wound up with food poisoning. Please make sure you guys are washing your hands and make sure the food you serve is cleaned properly.

Came here with friends after searching for a place to eat. Got to say food was amazing. I had a chicken fajita and have to say was it was delicious, very flavorful. Cocktails on the other hand werenâ€™t the best to our liking. But overall my girlfriend and I loved. Great service and the vibe was great.
